__description_regex_comment__: To disable the regex search & replace of the transaction description, set both to an empty string.

choose_account_automation.__from_to_comment__: The following values will be passed directly into DateTime. Set them to null to choose them manually during import process.

tan_required_email_notification.__smtp_secure_comment__: either tls for STARTTLS or ssl for SMTPS
tan_required_email_notification.subject: [Firefly III Fin-TS] A Tan is required
